Text:
I thought sam&max will not boot from any usb loader? (even via alt dol method)
Is there already a method out there to get this running?

@supagusti: Yes, there is a method now to run Sam&Max:Season1 as well as Sam&Max:Season2 using USB loader. Use Configurable USB Loader alternative .dol method using Disc Plus enhancement (.wdm file). For instructions refer to  http://gwht.wikidot.com/alternate-dol
@r3dcat: worked perfectly! thanks for the tip.
